content: This juicy patty is made in-house and is seasoned to perfection. It sits between two toasted brioche buns and is completed with lettuce, coleslaw, tomato, pickles, cheese, pineapple, jalapeño, chili pepper, turkey bacon, caramelized onions, bacon jam and a secret sauce.
desc: This juicy patty is made in-house and is seasoned to perfection. It sits between two toasted brioche buns and is completed with lettuce, coleslaw, tomato, pickles, cheese, pineapple, jalapeño, chili pepper, turkey bacon, caramelized onions, bacon jam and a secret sauce.
name: TT's Signature Lamb Burger
title: TT's Signature Lamb Burger
